scripts.build: yarn react && yarn vue && yarn angular
scripts.install: yarn react:install && yarn vue:install && yarn angular:install
scripts.react: yarn cra && yarn cra-ts && yarn next && yarn vite-react
scripts.react:install: yarn cra:install && yarn cra-ts:install && yarn next:install && yarn vite-react:install
scripts.cra:install: echo 'NOTE: Testing using npm install instead of yarn' && npm install --prefix apps/react/cra
scripts.vite-vue: yarn --cwd apps/vue/vite build && yarn --cwd apps/vue/vite3 build
scripts.vite-vue:install: yarn --cwd apps/vue/vite install && yarn --cwd apps/vue/vite3 install
scripts.vite-react: yarn --cwd apps/react/vite build && yarn --cwd apps/react/vite3 build
scripts.vite-react:install: yarn --cwd apps/react/vite install && yarn --cwd apps/react/vite3 install
